ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from creating new Opportunities at stages 'Opportunity Recorded' or 'Proposal Qualified'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(OR( TEXT(StageName) = "Opportunity Recorded", TEXT(StageName) = "Prospect Qualified" )), ISNEW(), NOT($User.Email = "tim.moyce@planetpayment.com") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only create new Opportunities at stages 'Opportunity Recorded' or 'Proposal Qualified'.
